description:
Eri takes a timeout to confront the school nurse about her extracurricular activities with a certain delinquent! But when the girls’ relay race ends on a bad leg, the tough guy goes the distance to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Waffen der Frauen! Die Waffen der Männer! Entwaffnend!
Onna no Tatakai! / Otoko no Tatakai! / Tatakai Owatte...
Tyttöjen taisto! / Poikien taisto! / Taiston jälkeen...
Women`s Battle! / Men`s Battle! / After the Battle!
女の闘い! / 男の戦い! / たたかい終わって...
